title: Switching Stories
author: JGray
text: I know. I know. Some of you want to continue to follow the story of Theresa and William. On the other hand, I hope some of you are glad to return to the story of Chrys and Mandrake. There's some pretty fun stuff coming up, so stick with us, please!

replies.author: Ysa
replies.text: What doesn't kill us (like the suspense) will only make us stronger..... or cause a small riot.   Torture away!  Everyone seems to love it.  *mutters* sadistic bastards.

replies.author: Ayra*Guest*
replies.text: I like Chrys and Mandrake so I don't mind too much personally Considering the state of the escape pod, I think they are rather fortunate to have actually landed somewhere while still being alive. An hostile desert is better than deep space! I guess the pod actually was worth the 5 credits. Plus, there's a metal building-like thingy in the background, which is habited by peace-loving, gentle occupants, I'm sure.

replies.author: SoySauce*Guest*
replies.text: Emerging from an escape pod that landed in the middle of a vast desert? Why does this seem familiar?

replies.author: Ayshara*Guest*
replies.text: Is it just me or is there a Doctor Who reference in the first panel?

replies.author: Sio*Guest*
replies.text: I just wonder if the pictorial language the little one talks is the language of moisture vaporators.  Probably gonna need that.
